<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> he <S%G264>trespass<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> seven <S%G2034>times<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> seven <S%G2034>times<s%> in a <S%G2250>day<s%> turn <S%G1994>again<s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, I <S%G3340>repent<s%>; thou shalt <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G4369>Increase<s%> <S%G2254>our<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> ye <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2848>grain<s%> of mustard <S%G4615>seed<s%>, ye <S%G302>might<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G4807>sycamine<s%> tree, Be thou plucked up by the <S%G1610>root<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be thou <S%G5452>planted<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G302>should<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G722>plowing<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> feeding <S%G4165>cattle<s%>, will <S%G2046>say<s%> unto <S%G3739>him<s%> by and <S%G2112>by<s%>, when he is <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G68>field<s%>, <S%G3928>Go<s%> and sit down to <S%G377>meat<s%>?

<S%G3361><s%> Doth <S%G2192>he<s%> <S%G5485>thank<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> the things that were <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>? I <S%G1380>trow<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>likewise<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> ye shall have <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> those things which are <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3004>say<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> We <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G888>unprofitable<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%><S%G3754>:<s%> we have <S%G4160>done<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> was our <S%G3784>duty<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> them, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G4198>Go<s%> <S%G1925>shew<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> unto the <S%G2409>priests<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> it came to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, that, as <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G5217>went<s%> <S%G1722><s%>, they were <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, when he <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G2390>healed<s%>, turned <S%G5290>back<s%>, and <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, Were <S%G2511>there<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G2511>cleansed<s%>? <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> are the <S%G1767>nine<s%>?

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G450>Arise<s%>, go thy <S%G4198>way<s%>: <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> hath <S%G4982>made<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G4982>whole<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they shall <S%G2046>say<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2400>See<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>; <S%G2228>or<s%>, <S%G2400>see<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%>: <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G565>after<s%> them, <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1377>follow<s%> them.

They did <S%G2068>eat<s%>, they <S%G4095>drank<s%>, they married <S%G1060>wives<s%>, they were given in <S%G1547>marriage<s%>, <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G3575>Noe<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2787>ark<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2627>flood<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them <S%G537>all<s%>.

<S%G3421>Remember<s%> <S%G3091>Lot's<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%>.
